thread.title: James Douglas Mcalister
thread.title_full: Grand Home Furnishings reviewed by James Douglas Mcalister

author: James Douglas Mcalister
title: James Douglas Mcalister
text: We had a very good sales experience from Ci Ci but there was a slight mix up on delivery when a different agent in our sales person absence forgot to correctly book said delivery date. I give credit to store manager calling my daughter and grand daughter to extend an apology for delay. The purchase was a gift bedroom set for our grand daughter.
